TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit SecurityTokenAuthenticator extends System.Object

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenAuthenticator> 類別以及其衍生類別會驗證安全性權杖。 當您建立自訂的安全性權杖時，通常只會直接從 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenAuthenticator> 衍生類別。 如果您要覆寫內建之安全性權杖的預設驗證或授權行為，請從 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenAuthenticator> 所衍生之其中一個類別 (例如 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SamlSecurityTokenAuthenticator>) 衍生。
從 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenAuthenticator> 衍生類別時，請覆寫下列兩種方法：<xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenAuthenticator.ValidateTokenCore%2A> 和 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenAuthenticator.CanValidateTokenCore%2A>。 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenAuthenticator.CanValidateTokenCore%2A> 方法可決定這個安全性權杖驗證器是否可以驗證特定的安全性權杖。 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenAuthenticator.ValidateTokenCore%2A> 方法可決定安全性權杖並建立一組用於授權的授權原則。 授權原則會將在安全性權杖中找到的宣告對應至應用程式所需要的宣告。

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance bool CanValidateToken(class System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken token) cil managed
Public Function CanValidateToken (token As SecurityToken) As Boolean

Docs.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the specified security token can be validated by this security token authenticator.
Docs.returns: when token can be validated; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenAuthenticator.CanValidateToken%2A> 方法會檢查權杖參數是否為 `null`，然後呼叫 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenAuthenticator.CanValidateTokenCore%2A> 方法來判斷這個安全性權杖驗證器是否可以驗證 `token` 的安全性權杖類型。

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance bool CanValidateTokenCore(class System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken token) cil managed
Protected MustOverride Function CanValidateTokenCore (token As SecurityToken) As Boolean

Docs.summary: When overridden in a derived class, gets a value indicating whether the specified security token can be validated by this security token authenticator.

remarks.format: ## Remarks <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenAuthenticator.CanValidateTokenCore%2A> 方法會呼叫 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenAuthenticator.CanValidateToken%2A> 方法，來判斷這個安全性權杖驗證器是否可以驗證 `token` 的安全性權杖類型。 這樣不會驗證安全性權杖；而是由 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenAuthenticator.ValidateToken%2A> 方法執行。

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection`1<class System.IdentityModel.Policy.IAuthorizationPolicy> ValidateToken(class System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken token) cil managed
Public Function ValidateToken (token As SecurityToken) As ReadOnlyCollection(Of IAuthorizationPolicy)

Docs.summary: Authenticates the specified security token and returns the set of authorization policies for the security token.
Docs.returns: A of type that contains the set of authorization policies in effect for this application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenAuthenticator.ValidateToken%2A> 方法會檢查 `token` 參數是否為 `null`，然後呼叫 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenAuthenticator.CanValidateToken%2A> 方法來判斷這個安全性權杖驗證器是否可以驗證此安全性權杖，如果可以則呼叫 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenAuthenticator.ValidateTokenCore%2A> 方法。

Docs.exception: cannot be authenticated by this security token authenticator -or- is not authenticated.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection`1<class System.IdentityModel.Policy.IAuthorizationPolicy> ValidateTokenCore(class System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken token) cil managed
Protected MustOverride Function ValidateTokenCore (token As SecurityToken) As ReadOnlyCollection(Of IAuthorizationPolicy)

Docs.summary: When overridden in a derived class, authenticates the specified security token and returns the set of authorization policies for the security token.
Docs.returns: A of type that contains the set of authorization policies in effect for this application.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 覆寫 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenAuthenticator.ValidateTokenCore%2A> 方法以驗證指定的安全性權杖型別。
覆寫 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenAuthenticator.ValidateTokenCore%2A> 方法時，請遵循下列方針：
- 當安全性權杖會傳入`token`參數不可以是通過驗證，則擲回<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenValidationException>例外狀況。
- 如果沒有任何對這個應用程式有效用的授權原則時，就傳回型別為 <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection%601> 的空 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Policy.IAuthorizationPolicy>。
當這個方法傳回`null`，Windows Communication Foundation 就會擲回<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenValidationException>例外狀況。
<xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenAuthenticator.ValidateTokenCore%2A> 方法會呼叫 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenAuthenticator.ValidateToken%2A> 方法。
